text:
Message 30 of 4024
Ok. I honestly feel like anything, no matter what that I suggest, that will show the kids something positive, is always a hard no. No matter what.
Do you ever have plans to show any conflict resolution and civility? I am really hoping we work back to the Alyssa model someday.
But I’m honestly concerned you have cast me as such an irredeemable villain to everyone that you can’t show anything else and save face.
I guess we should be honest if we even share goals of healing and civility or if we are always going to be hateful and demeaning to each other.
And I’m not at all looking to debate it on Xmas eve. I’m just looking for a truthful answer because if it takes time, fine. But “never” is not healthy.
Sent:12/24/2023 at 03:14 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/24/2023 at 03:21 PM)
Subject:Re: Elsa and Casey
Message 31 of 4024
This back and forth today is causing ma a lot of anxiety as I feel pressure to respond which was not intention to moving to this platform. Let’s table
this and I’m going to focus on the rest of the evening with kids. Please respect that
Sent:12/24/2023 at 03:23 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/24/2023 at 03:23 PM)
Subject:Re: Elsa and Casey
Message 32 of 4024
Just wanted to let you know we did good.
Some awesome stocking stuffers from Mom & Dad. A really cool robotics set (1 each) from Mom & Dad. And then their big gift from Santa as we
planned!  Really think they should enjoy their gifts this year!
Hope you are having an awesome time!
